languages.text: {n}Аустериус задумывается.{/n} "Простор Коронус — окраина Империума... во многом — дикий край, где расстояния между населенными мирами велики, а пустота между ними полна опасностей. И речь не только о врагах Человечества — здесь предостаточно пустотных аномалий и варп-возмущений, способных уничтожить даже испытанное временем судно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервус задумывается.{/n} "Простор Коронус — окраина Империума... во многом — дикий край, где расстояния между населенными мирами велики, а пустота между ними полна опасностей. И речь не только о врагах Человечества — здесь предостаточно пустотных аномалий и варп-возмущений, способных уничтожить даже испытанное временем судно".

languages.text: {n}Thorfast pauses to think.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is the outskirts of the Imperium... in many ways a frontier, where the distances between inhabited worlds are great and the void that fills these gaps is full of dangers. And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."
languages.original_text: {n}Аустериус задумывается.{/n} "Простор Коронус — окраина Империума... во многом — дикий край, где расстояния между населенными мирами велики, а пустота между ними полна опасностей. И речь не только о врагах Человечества — здесь предостаточно пустотных аномалий и варп-возмущений, способных уничтожить даже испытанное временем судно".

And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

languages.text: {n}ソーファストはしばらく考え込む。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスは帝国の外縁部…居住惑星同士の距離も遠いし、その隙間を埋める虚空には数多くの危険が潜んでいる、色々な意味でのフロンティアだ。人類の敵のことだけを言ってるんじゃない…ベテラン船さえ破壊されるようなヴォイドの異常や歪みの擾乱もたくさんあるんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorfast pauses to think.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is the outskirts of the Imperium... in many ways a frontier, where the distances between inhabited worlds are great and the void that fills these gaps is full of dangers. And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソーファストはしばらく考え込む。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスは帝国の外縁部…居住惑星同士の距離も遠いし、その隙間を埋める虚空には数多くの危険が潜んでいる、色々な意味でのフロンティアだ。人類の敵のことだけを言ってるんじゃない…ベテラン船さえ破壊されるようなヴォイドの異常や歪みの擾乱もたくさんあるんだ」

languages.text: {n}Thorfast réfléchit un instant.{/n} « Les Étendues de Koronus sont à la périphérie de l'Imperium... De bien des façons, il s'agit d'une frontière, où les mondes habités sont séparés par d'immenses distances de vide regorgeant de danger. Et je ne parle pas seulement des ennemis de l'humanité ; il existe de nombreuses anomalies et perturbations dans le Warp capables de détruire même le plus résistant des vaisseaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorfast pauses to think.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is the outskirts of the Imperium... in many ways a frontier, where the distances between inhabited worlds are great and the void that fills these gaps is full of dangers. And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorfast réfléchit un instant.{/n} « Les Étendues de Koronus sont à la périphérie de l'Imperium... De bien des façons, il s'agit d'une frontière, où les mondes habités sont séparés par d'immenses distances de vide regorgeant de danger. Et je ne parle pas seulement des ennemis de l'humanité ; il existe de nombreuses anomalies et perturbations dans le Warp capables de détruire même le plus résistant des vaisseaux. »

languages.text: {n}索法特顿了顿，思考片刻。{/n}“科罗努斯扩区位于帝国外围区域……从各个方面而言，这里都是帝国的边疆地带。人类居住的诸多世界相隔非常遥远，而这些世界之间的虚空之中充满了危险。我指的并不仅仅是人类之敌，还有各种各样的虚空怪物与亚空间扰动，这些危险甚至足以摧毁久经考验的飞船。”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorfast pauses to think.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is the outskirts of the Imperium... in many ways a frontier, where the distances between inhabited worlds are great and the void that fills these gaps is full of dangers. And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}索法特顿了顿，思考片刻。{/n}“科罗努斯扩区位于帝国外围区域……从各个方面而言，这里都是帝国的边疆地带。人类居住的诸多世界相隔非常遥远，而这些世界之间的虚空之中充满了危险。我指的并不仅仅是人类之敌，还有各种各样的虚空怪物与亚空间扰动，这些危险甚至足以摧毁久经考验的飞船。”

languages.text: {n}Thorfast denkt kurz nach.{/n} "Die Koronus-Ausdehnung liegt im Randbereich des Imperiums ... sie ist quasi Grenzgebiet, mit großen Entfernungen zwischen bewohnten Welten und zahlreichen Gefahren unterwegs. Und damit meine ich nicht nur die Feinde der Menschheit – diverse Leerenanomalien und Warp-Störungen können selbst ein erfahrenes Schiff zerstören."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorfast pauses to think.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is the outskirts of the Imperium... in many ways a frontier, where the distances between inhabited worlds are great and the void that fills these gaps is full of dangers. And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorfast denkt kurz nach.{/n} "Die Koronus-Ausdehnung liegt im Randbereich des Imperiums ... sie ist quasi Grenzgebiet, mit großen Entfernungen zwischen bewohnten Welten und zahlreichen Gefahren unterwegs. Und damit meine ich nicht nur die Feinde der Menschheit – diverse Leerenanomalien und Warp-Störungen können selbst ein erfahrenes Schiff zerstören."

languages.text: {n}Thorfast hace una pausa para pensar.{/n} «La Extensión de Koronus abarca las afueras del Imperium... funcionando en parte como una frontera, cuyas distancias entre mundos habitados son enormes y el vacío que hay entre ellos está lleno de peligros. Y no solo me refiero a los enemigos de la Humanidad: hay muchas anomalías y alteraciones disformes que podrían destrozar hasta a la nave más resistente».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorfast pauses to think.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is the outskirts of the Imperium... in many ways a frontier, where the distances between inhabited worlds are great and the void that fills these gaps is full of dangers. And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorfast hace una pausa para pensar.{/n} «La Extensión de Koronus abarca las afueras del Imperium... funcionando en parte como una frontera, cuyas distancias entre mundos habitados son enormes y el vacío que hay entre ellos está lleno de peligros. Y no solo me refiero a los enemigos de la Humanidad: hay muchas anomalías y alteraciones disformes que podrían destrozar hasta a la nave más resistente».

languages.text: {n}Thorfast bir süre duraksayıp düşünüyor.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği, İmparatorluk'un en uç noktalarındadır. Birçok açıdan bir sınırdır. Koloni kurulmuş dünyalar arasındaki mesafeler çok büyük olup bu boşlukları dolduran uçsuz da tehlikelerle doludur. Sadece İnsanlığın düşmanlarından da bahsetmiyorum, kendini kanıtlamış gemileri bile yok edebilme kapasitesine sahip sayısız uçsuz anomalisi ve öteboyut bozunumu bulunur."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorfast pauses to think.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is the outskirts of the Imperium... in many ways a frontier, where the distances between inhabited worlds are great and the void that fills these gaps is full of dangers. And I am not just talking about the enemies of Humanity — there are plenty of void anomalies and warp disturbances capable of destroying even a time-tested vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorfast bir süre duraksayıp düşünüyor.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği, İmparatorluk'un diyarlarının en kenarlarındadır. Birçok açıdan bir sınırdır. Kolonileşmiş dünyalar arasındaki mesafeler çok büyüktür ve bu boşlukları dolduran uçsuz, tehlikelerle doludur. Sadece İnsanlığın düşmanlarından da bahsetmiyorum, zamanla sınanmış bir gemiyi bile yok edebilme kapasitesine sahip sayısız uçsuz anomalisi ve öteboyut bozunumu bulunur."
